deleteAccountModal.title: Delete Account

admin.templateSuggestionsDesc: Review and approve user-submitted game templates

admin.playerLinkingDesc: Manually link old player names to registered users
admin.eloManagementDesc: Recalculate ELO ratings from historical game data

adminUsers.anonymizeWarning: This will anonymize the account and remove:

adminUsers.preserveWarning: The following will be preserved (anonymized username):
adminUsers.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters long

adminTemplates.approveConfirm: Are you sure you want to approve this template suggestion?
adminTemplates.approvedSuccess: Template approved and added to system templates!

adminPlayerLinking.title: Player Identity Linking
adminPlayerLinking.description: Link guest player identities to registered user accounts
adminPlayerLinking.useCase1: A user played games as a guest before registering
adminPlayerLinking.useCase2: Multiple guest entries exist for the same person
adminPlayerLinking.useCase3: Games aren't showing in a user's H2H statistics
adminPlayerLinking.result1Desc: All games with the guest identity now show the linked user
adminPlayerLinking.result2Desc: H2H stats combine all linked identities
adminPlayerLinking.result3Desc: Original guest ID is saved for potential unlink
adminPlayerLinking.unlinkedDesc: Select a guest identity to link it to a registered user account.
adminPlayerLinking.selectIdentityHint: Select a guest identity from the list to link it to a user account
adminPlayerLinking.linkedDesc: Guest identities that have been linked to user accounts. You can unlink them if needed.

adminGameLinkage.title: Game Linkage Management
adminGameLinkage.description: Retroactively link games to user accounts based on player names.
adminGameLinkage.identitiesIncludedDesc: Linked player identities are also matched
adminGameLinkage.onlyUserId: Only the userId field is modified
adminGameLinkage.dataUnchanged: Game data, scores, and player names remain unchanged
adminGameLinkage.linkAllDesc: Scan all registered users and link games where their username or aliases appear as a player name.
adminGameLinkage.dryRunNote: This is a dry-run preview. No changes have been made yet.
adminGameLinkage.allLinkedDesc: No unlinked games were found for any users. Everything is up to date!
adminGameLinkage.noNewIdentitiesDesc: All identities were already claimed by their respective users.
adminGameLinkage.useCase1Desc: Link games for existing users who registered before this feature
adminGameLinkage.useCase2Desc: After importing users or games from another system
adminGameLinkage.useCase3Desc: If automatic linking failed during registration
adminGameLinkage.safeOperationDesc: This operation only adds userId references to games. It does not modify game data, scores, or player names. Games that are already correctly linked will be automatically skipped.
adminGameLinkage.linkConfirm: This will link all identified games to their respective user accounts. Continue?

adminElo.title: ELO Management
adminElo.description: Recalculate ELO ratings for all players from historical game data.
adminElo.calculatesChanges: Calculates changes based on actual results
adminElo.recalculateDesc: Preview changes before applying to see how many players and games will be affected.
adminElo.successMessage: ELO ratings have been successfully recalculated. Players can now see their updated rankings on the leaderboard.
adminElo.recalculateConfirm: This will recalculate ELO ratings for {{gameType}}. This operation cannot be undone. Continue?
